CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity__r.CPSD_Opportunity_ID_18_Digit__c)), (HYPERLINK("https://na95.salesforce.com/"&Opportunity__r.CPSD_Opportunity_ID_18_Digit__c ,'Click here to request Deal Support for MDC')), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select this link to submit an MDC Deal Support Request. You will be redirected to CPSD SFDC, where you will be requested to log into CPSD SFDC to submit your request.
CustomField.label: Deal Support for MDC Products
